All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Book
Represents a book in the library system.
BookCopy
Represents a physical copy of a book in the library system.
BorrowingRecord
Represents a borrowing record in the library system.
BorrowRecordDTO
Represents a borrowing record in the library system.
BorrowReport
Represents a borrowing report for a genre in the library system.
ClientConnectedController
Controller for the ClientConnected GUI.
DataLogs
Represents a data log in the library system.
DateUtils
Utility class for converting between java.sql.Date and java.time.LocalDate.
EchoServer
This class overrides some of the methods in the abstract superclass in order to give more functionality to the server.
InstanceManager
The InstanceManager class provides a centralized way to manage and access various instances used throughout the application, such as the server instance, database connection, and controllers.
Librarian
Represents a librarian in the library system.
Logic
The Logic class contains the core business logic for handling various operations such as user login, notifications, subscriber management, book management, and report generation.
MessageUtils
Utility class for sending messages to clients.
mysqlConnection
MySQL Database Connection Manager for the Library Management System.
Notification
Represents a notification in the library system.
OrderRecord
Represents an order record in the library system.
OrderRecordDTO
Represents an order record in the library system.
OrderResponse
Represents an order response in the library system.
ReportSaver
The ReportSaver class is responsible for saving and loading monthly reports.
ReportScheduler
The ReportScheduler class is responsible for scheduling and generating monthly reports.
ServerMessage
Represents a message from the server to the client.
ServerPortFrameController
Controller for the ServerPortFrame GUI.
ServerUI
The ServerUI class is the entry point for the server application.
SqlConnectionController
Controller for the SqlConnection GUI.
Subscriber
Represents a subscriber in the library system.
SubscriberReport
Represents a subscriber report in the library system.
